statements: SELECT * FROM stolen_information;
SELECT victim_name, victim_email, address FROM stolen_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT victim_name, password, credit_card_number FROM stolen_information WHERE victim_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM stolen_information ORDER BY victim_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM stolen_information WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT victim_name, victim_email, credit_card_number FROM stolen_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, victim_name, address FROM stolen_information WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM stolen_information WHERE password = 'password123';
SELECT victim_name FROM stolen_information ORDER BY victim_name DESC;
SELECT id, victim_email FROM stolen_information WHERE credit_card_number LIKE '%1234%' AND address NOT LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT * FROM stolen_personal_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM stolen_personal_information WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT id, name, email FROM stolen_personal_information ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM phishing_attempts WHERE success_status = TRUE;
SELECT victim_name, victim_email, phishing_url FROM phishing_attempts ORDER BY attempt_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM stolen_personal_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM stolen_personal_information WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM phishing_attempts WHERE success_status = TRUE;
SELECT victim_name, COUNT(phishing_url) AS num_attempts FROM phishing_attempts GROUP BY victim_name;
SELECT id, name, email FROM stolen_personal_information WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT full_name, ssn FROM stolen_personal_information;
SELECT * FROM phishing_attempts ORDER BY phishing_date DESC;
SELECT victim_name, victim_email, phishing_url FROM phishing_attempts WHERE phishing_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT item_name, price, seller_id FROM dark_web_resale WHERE successful_sale = TRUE;
SELECT id, full_name, email, address, phone_number FROM stolen_personal_information WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT full_name, email FROM stolen_personal_information;
SELECT * FROM phishing_attempts WHERE phishing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT victim_name, phishing_url FROM phishing_attempts ORDER BY victim_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, price, seller_id FROM dark_web_resale WHERE successful_sale = TRUE;
SELECT id, ssn, email FROM stolen_personal_information WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM personal_information;
SELECT id, full_name, email FROM stolen_credentials WHERE website='example.com';
SELECT phishing_url, location FROM phishing_attempts ORDER BY date_attempted DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, seller_id FROM dark_web_marketing WHERE sold = true;
SELECT victim_email FROM phishing_attempts WHERE method='email';
SELECT * FROM personal_information LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, full_name, email FROM personal_information ORDER BY email DESC, full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM stolen_credentials WHERE website = 'example.com';
SELECT username, website, date_stolen FROM stolen_credentials WHERE date_stolen BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT victim_email, success_rate, location FROM phishing_attempts WHERE location LIKE '%USA%' AND method = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM Stolen_Credit_Cards ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT id, card_number, expiration_date FROM Stolen_Credit_Cards WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, address FROM Stolen_Credit_Cards WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Stolen_Passwords WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT item_name, price, seller FROM Dark_Web_Listings WHERE price <= 500.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Stolen_Credit_Cards WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, address FROM Stolen_Credit_Cards WHERE id = 1001;
SELECT ssn FROM Stolen_Social_Security_Numbers WHERE id > 500 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, password FROM Stolen_Passwords WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT item_name, price, seller FROM Dark_Web_Listings WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
